item.title: The 8 Best Handheld Vacuums, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Lightweight, powerful, and generally inexpensive, the handheld vacuum is the perfect household helper.

item.title: 21 Gifts for Dads Who Don't Need Anything (2025)
item.description: The best gift idea for your dad is a nicer version of something he already owns. The second best is one of these things.

item.title: Priority Current Plus Ebike Review: Serious Power, Effortless Fun
item.description: Priority's new flagship ebike is a premium, classy-looking ride that lets you feel the joy of the open road.

item.title: Staples Union & Scale Electric Standing Desk Review: Micro Movements
item.description: This basic standing desk is easy to assemble and simple to configure, but it sure could use more customization options.

item.title: What Is Google One? A Breakdown of Plans, Pricing, and Included Services
item.description: If you use Google’s apps and AI, it’s worth looking at this all-inclusive service. We break down the plans and how much they cost.
